level.heading: Foreign or alien society; admission.
level.text: No foreign or alien society shall transact business in the District without a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner in accordance with §§ 31-4501 and 31-4502 and § 31-2502.21.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-5301.
